channel.title: CRAN.IO Blog
channel.description: Best practices used by CRAN.IO developers
channel.author: Bob Bobbert

item.title: Hello world!
item.description:
Hello Earthlings! Welcome to our blog. Here you will find articles about the best practices that we implement in CRAN.IO, the technologies that we use and the projects that we are working on.

If you want to know more about us you can visit our website, follow us on twitter or like us on facebook.
item.author: Bob Bobbert
